#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#define MAX 100000
typedef unsigned long long ull;
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	ull ans;
	while(t--)
	{
		long n;
		scanf("%ld",&n);
		if(n%2!=0)
		{
		printf("%d\n",0);
		}
		else
		{
			printf("9");
			for(long i=1;i<=n/2-1;i++)
			printf("0");
			printf("\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
